subject: fix: improve chat scroll performance by reducing unnecessary re-renders
body:
- Reduce reactions polling from 3s to 30s (realtime is primary, polling is safety net)
- Memoize renderItem and message IDs to prevent defeating MessageBubble memo()
- Remove permanent CSS transition on message bubbles that caused animation jank during scroll
- Replace expensive backdrop-filter blur on chat header with opaque background
